resources.string:
Hi there ,
Thank you for Downloading Kaka and Chui v1.0

You now have access to try it out for limited period.Go Premium and get full access for only Ksh 250/yr

 Available payment methods
 ◦ Mpesa 
 ◦ Credit Card(Visa/Mastercard) 
 ◦ PayPal

This feature is available for premium users only.

Become a premium user for only 250ksh/yr.

Accepted payment methods
 ◦ Mpesa 
 ◦ Credit Card(Visa/Mastercard) 
 ◦ PayPal

How to Pay 

 1.Go to Mpesa Menu 
 2.Select Lipa na M-PESA 
 3.Buy Goods and Services 
 4. Enter till number XXXXXX 
 5.Enter Amount Ksh.250 
 6.Enter Your M-Pesa Pin and complete the transaction

 Once the Confirmation message is received , you will have full access to the app.
